solution_line_template: If half-hour lesson is worth ${half_hour_lesson_cost}, then a one-hour lesson costs {half_hours_per_lesson} * {half_hour_lesson_cost} = $<<{half_hour_lesson_cost}*{half_hours_per_lesson}={one_hour_lesson_cost}>>{one_hour_lesson_cost}.
One lesson per week would mean that in {num_weeks} weeks the teacher would earn {one_hour_lesson_cost} * {num_weeks} = $<<{one_hour_lesson_cost}*{num_weeks}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
